alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broward County through 430 PM EDT... At 403 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, or 21 miles west of Pembroke Pines, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal and West Broward Rec. Area On Alligator Alley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
